text: Ruth de Souza (May 12, 1921 – July 28, 2019) was a Brazilian actress.Grandes Pioneiros, Grandes Atores She was born in Rio de Janeiro. de Souza was known for her roles in The Landowner's Daughter, Macumba Love and in A Glass of Rage. She was awarded with Prêmio Saci. De Souza died of pneumonia on July 28, 2019 in Copacabana, Brazil at the age of 98.Atriz Ruth de Souza morre no Rio aos 98 anos == References == == Other websites == * Category:1921 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro
title: Ruth de Souza
